nodes.text: The Torch Nebula, also known as the Torch sector, was a nebula located in the Outer Rim Territories. The Llanic Spice Run hyperspace route passed through the nebula. The Spice Runners of Kijimi undertook a heist on the nearby planet Guat'a, and subsequently had to escape the Osako pirates through the Torch Nebula along the Llanic Spice Run.
